      • setTransactionRefId

        @NonNull
public EasyUpiPayment.Builder setTransactionRefId(@NonNull
                                                            String refId)
        Sets the Transaction Reference ID. Transaction reference ID. This could be order number, subscription number, Bill ID, booking ID, insurance renewal reference, etc. Needed for merchant transactions and dynamic URL generation.
        Parameters:
        refId - field is used in Merchant Payments generated by PSPs.
        Returns:
        this, for chaining.

      • setDescription

public EasyUpiPayment.Builder setDescription(@NonNull

      • setAmount

        @NonNull
public EasyUpiPayment.Builder setAmount(@NonNull
                                                  String amount)
        Sets the Amount in INR. (Format should be decimal e.g. 14.88)
        Parameters:
        amount - field takes amount in String decimal format (xx.xx) to be paid. For e.g. 90.88 will pay Rs. 90.88.
        Returns:
        this, for chaining.
